alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 5:09AM EST until further notice by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...REPLACES FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central Indiana, south central Indiana, southwest Indiana and west central Indiana, including the following counties, in central Indiana, Bartholomew, Johnson, Morgan and Shelby. In south central Indiana, Brown, Jackson, Lawrence and Monroe. In southwest Indiana, Greene. In west central Indiana, Owen. * WHEN...Until 900 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 509 AM EST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain. Flooding is already occurring in the warned area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bloomington, Columbus, Shelbyville, Franklin, Martinsville, Bloomfield, Spencer, Nashville, Ellettsville, Edinburgh, Flat Rock, Worthington, Princes Lakes, Morristown, Trafalgar, Morgantown, Fairland, Clifford, Stinesville and Helmsburg. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
